title: ADD LOGOS FOR FREE IN MY NEW BOOK !!
content:
INDEX BOOK AND PEDRO GUITTON,   
  
Have the pleasure to invite you to participate for FREE on:   
  
NORTH AND SOUTH AMERICA'S LOGOS.   
  
The book that will join for the first time the best logos from all America's Countries.   
  
For more informations about how to send your logos and who can join it :   
 [http://www.pedroguitton.com/northsouthamericaslogos.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002750/http:/www.pedroguitton.com/northsouthamericaslogos.htm)   
  
We are waitting for you !!!   
  
Pedro Guitton   
 [http://www.pedroguitton.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002750/http:/www.pedroguitton.com/)   
  
Index Book   
 [http://www.indexbook.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002750/http:/www.indexbook.com/)   
  
  
------------------ // ------------------------   
  
INDEX BOOK and PEDRO GUITTON,   
  
Te invitas a participar gratuitamiente del libro:   
  
NORTH AND SOUTH AMERICA'S LOGOS.   
  
Los m
author: pedro_guitton

comments.content: we can submit as many as we'd like i assume?
I'm a little confused. Is this a competition? Or will all submitted logos be included in this book? Is it open to anyone who has ever designed a logo at any point in time?

"Is this a competition?"   
   
I think it's spam.

hi, This is not Spam. and also not a competition.   
I'm collection good logos made in countries from North to South America to add in my thrid book.   
   
So if you have good logos to send me, i will be waitting for them together with the info i need from each one.   
   
everythign is in the link.   
Thanks   
Guitton

Pedro -   
   
Is this a different book than the "Logo Design Brasil

Not to just bump this spamvertised thread, here is a nice little story about Pedro Guitton, 'Index Book' and their 'ethics' of borrowing elements from existing logos they published in previous books.

Ill try to make this as short as possible, but this may be quite interesting, for some.

In 2002 / 2003 I designed a logo for a local restaurant, named 'benito'.  
_( [http://img467.imageshack.us/img467/4571/benito1ki.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002750/http:/img467.imageshack.us/img467/4571/benito1ki.gif "http://img467.imageshack.us/img467/4571/benito1ki.gif") )_

In 2004 I have been asked by Andres Fredes / Juland, if I would be interested in getting some of my works published in an upcoming book project, 'Around Europe Logos', released by 'Index Book', Barcelona. I was quite honored, back then, getting invited for this, so I submitted a few of my works, including the 'benito' logo. The book gets published, the 'benito' mark is in. Fine.

Earlier this week I get another invitation to submit works for an upcoming 'Index Book' release. This time coordinated by Pedro Guitton. I then take a look at his site and portfolio, and notice the following logo, he 'designed' for 'Burro Catalan', in 2005, according to his site.  
_( [http://img467.imageshack.us/img467/767/burrocatalan6yr.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002750/http:/img467.imageshack.us/img467/767/burrocatalan6yr.gif "http://img467.imageshack.us/img467/767/burrocatalan6yr.gif") )  
( Source of the 'Burro Catalan' sample image: [http://www.pedroguitton.com/mito\_3\_portfolio\_46.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002750/http:/www.pedroguitton.com/mito_3_portfolio_46.htm "http://www.pedroguitton.com/mito\_3\_portfolio\_46.htm") )_

I have yet to find out what exactly is the relation between the author of the book I actually submitted logos to, back then, Andres Fredes; The publisher 'Index Book' who then had high resolution, printable versions of the logos; And Pedro Guitton who evidently, shamelessly 'borrowed' elements from my 'benito' logo.

Of course I contacted Pedro Guitton, and the publisher 'Index Book' as well, to ask them about this. This is what Mr. Guitton responded:  
_'for my part it´s a complete coincidence...'  
'believed or not i have my mind clear and i´m a really creative person  
have a good one !'_

( I have yet to get any response from the publisher itself. )

Dav

pedro\_guitton  
You can download my logos for your book [here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014002750/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/)

Sorry guys - I must admit I didn't do ALL of these…

peace
David, that is most certainly lifted from your design. It's not "similar" or "inspired by" but an exact copy. Thanks for the heads-up. Paul, you've done quite an impressive body of work there... :)

It's just that I don't exactly understand the repurpose, oops Freudian slip, of this book…

peace
